descriptionHTML:
App now available with which you can receive your messages on the clock Whatsapp comfortably .

< b> IMPORTANT : < / b > If you update the app to the latest version , you'll probably need to reinstall the application. We keep improving and making final adjustments .

Configuration: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CiTS_qauIa8
What gives you the application ?:

- Reply the whatsapp with the image of the contact profile.
- Ability to view the videos received (Some encoding formats charging time is long ) .
- Viewing images received .
- Ability to view messages received without touching the smartwarch
- Ability to receive messages with Chathead .
- Option to read them sorted by arrival order or grouped by conversation.
- Possibility of main call the contact from the watch , respond with Whatsapp or delete the message .

We continue to work on improving the app and move forward in new versions with your advice .

A Enjoy your Android Wear and Whatsapp messages .
comments: Images and videos are not always shown. Only 1 of every 5 pics or videos are shown. The official whatsapp app can handle replying already. Inquiries for support has been ignored.

Nice program Silence night doesn't work on samsung note 3 / lollipop. The watch vibrates on charge cradle. Please add an option that puts message on screen like android wear messages. If I missed the message I should see it without touching the watch. Thank you!
Connection issues Hi, since the install it shows connecting "WhatsApp" can you please help?

Not working well Bubble of profile pic on screen is nice! But I can only view whatsapp image after opening the app on watch. And no voice message can play on watch yet :-/  I am using ausus zenwatch 2 with speaker.
How I can change the languages
Never show any video never hear whatsapp  voice  message
recentChanges: - Fixed problem with automatic shutdown of some messages.
- Added option to change the display time messages.
